title: Is using a VPN allowed?
body:
So I have a problem that's lasting too much time, it's a problem related with the "way" I connect to the server from the client. I've made a post about it.
I find a way to solve it and it was using a VPN, just for the client, I can play ok once I'm in-game, so my question is if I can use said VPN without getting banned.

replies.body: so does this mean if we use vpn we are not going to get banned or anything right?

In general, third party programs is not something we can support, so we can't help if there's any technical issues as a result.  VPN is a solid method for troubleshooting some connection issues, and not something we take issue with.  Just make sure that whatever you're using is safe and free of any malicious content.  Have at it!
